about-me.title: About me
about-me.description:
My fullname is Agustín Karkocki and I'm FrontEnd programmer. I studied at the UTN (Universidad Tecnólogica Nacional - National Technology University) in Argentina and I graduated in 2017. Since 2016 I worked as a freelance programmer and also in Argentine and international companies. I like to much design and always try to improve in that, learning technologies like Photoshop, Figma, etc. and seeing new trends for example.

For many years I used programming languajes like PHP and Mysql, developing customs CMS developing own CMS for loading news, products, personnel, etc. in database.

Also I worked with Wodpress developing my own plugins and themes from scratch. I used Shopify complementing it with Vue for almost 1 year in a US company where I improved a lot my knowledge about Javascript, Pixel Perfect in the design and many methods to improve the accessibility and analytics of a website. Currently I'm totally focused on Front End development using React mainly. My next goal is Redux.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: I worked at least 150 sites in my career with differents technologies, here is my resumen of my programmer's years.
experience.job1_desc: Web developer with Shopify using HTML, CSS, JS & Vue
experience.job2_desc: Design web. Backends made with WordPress. Custom plugins and themes. Optimization. Technologies used: html5 - CSS - JavaScript - Wordpress - PHP & MySql - API - AMP
experience.job3_desc: I worked making: Desing and programmin web (Frontend and Backend). Updating websites. Developed custom CMS autoadministrable. Optimization and improves of SEO. Technologies used: HTML, CSS, JS, JQUERY, AJAX, PHP, SQL.
experience.job4_desc: Self-manageable websites, for example Wordpress or an administrative panel with its respective database completely custom-made, SEO and site optimization.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: And more of 100 made to agencies!
